participant_1.background:
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love sports.
i currently suffer from social anxiety.
I enjoy reading about business and finance in my free time.
I drove my Mercedes through the Arizona desert.
I exercise daily to keep my health in check and to have enough energy to keep up with my pets.

participant_2.background:
I bought a card for my first crush on Valentine's Day.
our class is planning a trip to japan.
I am trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.

content.text: Pretty good! I just got back from a jog.
Nice! I just got back from the gym.
Do you do a lot of exercise?
Yeah, I try to exercise daily. I like to keep my health in check.
That's great! I try to exercise when I can, but it's not always easy.
I hear you. It's important to find a routine that works for you.
Yeah, I have to find some way to stay motivated.
I love to read, and I like to go shopping.
I love to read too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction.
That's a great genre! I'm a big fan of historical fiction too.
Have you heard of the Outlander series?
Yes! I love that series! I've read all of the books.
I've read the first few books, but I haven't finished them yet.
You should finish them! They're so good
